ğŸ“Œ Project Descriptionïƒ

The goal of this project is to calculate the shortest path from a source node to all other nodes using Dijkstraâ€™s algorithm. It is well-suited for geographic networks like river flows, roads, and pipelines.

Use Cases: - River network analysis in QGIS - Route calculation on transportation maps - General-purpose graph analysis

ğŸ› ï¸ How to Useïƒ

Import and use the module like this:

from shortestpath import dijkstra

graph = {
    'A': {'B': 1, 'C': 4},
    'B': {'C': 2, 'D': 5},
    'C': {'D': 1},
    'D': {}
}

print(dijkstra(graph, 'A'))

ğŸ“Š Function Tableïƒ

Function Name

Description

dijkstra()

Calculates the shortest path in a graph

shortest_path()

Returns the shortest route between 2 nodes
